_comment: Binance Futures Trading Bot Configuration Template
_instructions: Copy this file to config.json and fill in your settings. See README.md for detailed documentation.
_api_key_help: Your Binance API key. Required for PAPER and LIVE modes. Load from environment variable BINANCE_API_KEY for security.
_api_secret_help: Your Binance API secret. Required for PAPER and LIVE modes. Load from environment variable BINANCE_API_SECRET for security.
_symbol_help: Trading pair symbol. Default: BTCUSDT. Must be a valid Binance Futures symbol.
_timeframe_entry_help: Entry signal timeframe. Default: 15m. Valid values: 1m, 3m, 5m, 15m, 30m, 1h, 4h.
_timeframe_filter_help: Trend filter timeframe. Default: 1h. Should be higher than entry timeframe.
_risk_per_trade_help: Risk per trade as decimal (0.01 = 1%). Default: 0.01. Range: 0.001 to 0.05.
_leverage_help: Leverage multiplier. Default: 3. Range: 1 to 125. Higher leverage = higher risk.
_stop_loss_atr_multiplier_help: Initial stop-loss distance in ATR multiples. Default: 2.0. Range: 1.0 to 5.0.
_trailing_stop_atr_multiplier_help: Trailing stop distance in ATR multiples. Default: 1.5. Range: 1.0 to 5.0.
_atr_period_help: ATR calculation period. Default: 14. Range: 5 to 50.
_adx_period_help: ADX calculation period. Default: 14. Range: 5 to 50.
_adx_threshold_help: Minimum ADX for trade entry. Default: 20.0. Range: 10.0 to 50.0.
_rvol_period_help: RVOL calculation period. Default: 20. Range: 10 to 100.
_rvol_threshold_help: Minimum RVOL for trade entry. Default: 1.2. Range: 1.0 to 3.0.
_backtest_days_help: Days of historical data for backtesting. Default: 90. Range: 7 to 365.
_trading_fee_help: Trading fee as decimal (0.0005 = 0.05%). Default: 0.0005. Binance Futures maker/taker fee.
_slippage_help: Slippage as decimal (0.0002 = 0.02%). Default: 0.0002. Simulates market impact.
_run_mode_help: Operational mode. Valid values: BACKTEST (historical simulation), PAPER (live data, simulated execution), LIVE (real trading with real money).
_log_file_help: Performance metrics output file. Default: binance_results.json.
_advanced_features_note: These features are disabled by default. Enable them individually to enhance bot performance.
_enable_adaptive_thresholds_help: Enable dynamic threshold adjustment based on market volatility. Default: false.
_enable_volume_profile_help: Enable volume profile analysis for support/resistance levels. Default: false.
_enable_ml_prediction_help: Enable machine learning trend prediction. Requires trained model. Default: false.
_enable_portfolio_management_help: Enable multi-symbol portfolio management. Default: false.
_enable_advanced_exits_help: Enable partial profit taking and dynamic stops. Default: false.
_enable_regime_detection_help: Enable market regime detection (trending/ranging/volatile). Default: false.
_adaptive_threshold_update_interval_help: Threshold update interval in seconds. Default: 3600 (1 hour).
_adaptive_threshold_lookback_days_help: Days of historical data for volatility calculation. Default: 30.
_timeframe_5m_help: 5-minute timeframe for precise entry timing. Default: 5m.
_timeframe_4h_help: 4-hour timeframe for overall trend direction. Default: 4h.
_timeframe_weights_help: Weights for each timeframe (must sum to 1.0). Default: 5m=0.1, 15m=0.2, 1h=0.3, 4h=0.4.
_min_timeframe_alignment_help: Minimum aligned timeframes for signal generation. Default: 3 out of 4.
_volume_profile_lookback_days_help: Days of volume data for profile calculation. Default: 7.
_volume_profile_update_interval_help: Profile update interval in seconds. Default: 14400 (4 hours).
_volume_profile_bin_size_help: Price bin size as decimal (0.001 = 0.1%). Default: 0.001.
_volume_profile_value_area_pct_help: Percentage of volume for value area. Default: 0.70 (70%).
_volume_profile_key_level_threshold_help: Proximity threshold for key levels (0.005 = 0.5%). Default: 0.005.
_volume_profile_low_volume_size_reductio: Position size reduction in low volume areas. Default: 0.5 (50%).
_ml_model_path_help: Path to trained ML model file. Default: models/ml_predictor.pkl.
_ml_feature_count_help: Number of features for ML model. Default: 20.
_ml_accuracy_window_help: Rolling window for accuracy tracking. Default: 100 predictions.
_ml_retrain_interval_days_help: Model retraining interval in days. Default: 7.
_ml_training_lookback_days_help: Training data lookback in days. Default: 90.
_portfolio_symbols_help: List of symbols to trade. Default: ["BTCUSDT"]. Max 5 symbols.
_portfolio_correlation_threshold_help: Correlation threshold for exposure limits. Default: 0.7.
_portfolio_correlation_max_exposure_help: Max combined exposure for correlated symbols. Default: 0.5 (50%).
_portfolio_rebalance_interval_help: Rebalance interval in seconds. Default: 21600 (6 hours).
_exit_partial_1_atr_multiplier_help: First partial exit profit level (ATR multiplier). Default: 1.5.
_exit_partial_2_atr_multiplier_help: Second partial exit profit level (ATR multiplier). Default: 3.0.
_exit_final_atr_multiplier_help: Final exit profit level (ATR multiplier). Default: 5.0.
_exit_breakeven_atr_multiplier_help: Profit level to move stop to breakeven. Default: 2.0.
_exit_tight_stop_atr_multiplier_help: Tight trailing stop on momentum reversal. Default: 0.5.
_exit_max_hold_time_hours_help: Maximum position hold time in hours. Default: 24.
_exit_regime_change_enabled_help: Close positions on regime change. Default: true.
_regime_update_interval_help: Regime update interval in seconds. Default: 900 (15 minutes).
_regime_stability_minutes_help: Required stability before regime change. Default: 15 minutes.
_regime_trending_adx_threshold_help: ADX threshold for trending regime. Default: 30.0.
_regime_ranging_adx_threshold_help: ADX threshold for ranging regime. Default: 20.0.
_regime_volatile_atr_percentile_help: ATR percentile for volatile regime. Default: 80.0.
_regime_ranging_atr_percentile_help: ATR percentile for ranging regime. Default: 40.0.
_regime_trending_stop_multiplier_help: Stop multiplier in trending regime. Default: 2.5.
_regime_ranging_stop_multiplier_help: Stop multiplier in ranging regime. Default: 1.0.
_regime_volatile_size_reduction_help: Position size reduction in volatile regime. Default: 0.5 (50%).
_regime_volatile_threshold_increase_help: Threshold increase in volatile regime. Default: 0.3 (30%).
_max_memory_mb_help: Maximum memory usage in MB. Default: 500.
_ml_prediction_timeout_ms_help: ML prediction timeout in milliseconds. Default: 100.
_api_rate_limit_per_minute_help: API rate limit per minute. Default: 1200.
_data_cleanup_interval_hours_help: Data cleanup interval in hours. Default: 6.
_async_volume_profile_help: Calculate volume profile asynchronously. Default: true.
_safety_1: ⚠️  ALWAYS test with BACKTEST mode first
_safety_2: ⚠️  Use PAPER mode to verify strategy with live data before risking real money
_safety_3: ⚠️  LIVE mode trades with REAL MONEY - use at your own risk
_safety_4: ⚠️  Press ESC at any time to trigger panic close (closes all positions immediately)
_safety_5: ⚠️  Never share your API keys - store them in environment variables
_safety_6: ⚠️  Use isolated margin mode to limit risk per position
_safety_7: ⚠️  Advanced features increase complexity - test thoroughly before enabling in live trading
